explains: v. 重新获得，恢复；重回，回到（某处）
wordGroup: moisture regain 吸湿（性）；回潮率；回潮
regain consciousness 苏醒；恢复知觉

sentences.en: She paused on the edge, trying to regain her balance.
sentences.cn: 她在边缘上暂停下来，努力恢复平衡。

sentences.en: The Russians had to dive-bomb the cities to regain control.
sentences.cn: 俄军不得不派出战斗机俯冲轰炸以重新夺回对城市的控制。

sentences.en: Theoretically, such equipment could help paraplegics regain movement.
sentences.cn: 从理论上说，这样的器械可以帮助下身瘫痪者重新获得活动能力。
